definition: Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: The auction house estimates it to be worth as much as HK$60,000.
sentences.chinese: 蘇黎世亞洲預計這枚信封能拍出60，000港元。

sentences.english: Ackman says investors can buy the Hong Kong Dollar 'outright.'
sentences.chinese: 阿克曼說，投資者可以“直接”買入港元。

sentences.english: The minimum amount of lump sum contribution is HK$5,000.
sentences.chinese: 整筆供款的最低供款金額爲5，000港元。

sentences.english: The carrying amounts of the Foundation's other receivables are denominated in Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 本基金其他應收款的賬面值以港元單位。

sentences.english: Last year surplus of HK$17 was set off against subvention received in current year.
sentences.chinese: 去年的17港元盈餘已與本年所收的補助金對銷。

sentences.english: The average amount purchased by each person is estimated to be 522 HK Dollars.
sentences.chinese: 每人的平均購買額預計將達522港元。

sentences.english: And there is an HK$80 charge for orders under HK$500.
sentences.chinese: 訂餐金額低於500港元還要收取80港元的外送費。

sentences.english: And there is an HK$80 charge for orders under HK$500.
sentences.chinese: 訂餐金額低於500港元還要收取80港元的外送費。

sentences.english: Rehearsing with Charlene Choi from HK for our duet.
sentences.chinese: 排練由蔡卓妍港元，爲我們的二重唱。

sentences.english: He cautioned that there's at least one risk: China.
sentences.chinese: 他提醒，投資港元至少有一個風險，那就是中國。

sentences.english: If Hong Kong dollars depreciate against with RMB, it is easy to attract more China tourist to visit Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 若港元對人民幣貶值，會較易吸引內地遊客來港消費。

sentences.english: The rise was across - the - board , with demand , savings and time deposits all increasing.
sentences.chinese: 各類港元存款包括活期儲蓄及定期存款均告上升。

sentences.english: Offenders may face a fine of HK$1m and imprisonment of two years.
sentences.chinese: 違者最高可被罰款100萬港元及監禁兩年。

sentences.english: The monetary authority continued to buy Hong Kong dollars in offshore trading on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 金管局在週四晚繼續承接港元沽盤。

sentences.english: All remittances must be made by cheque or banker's cashier order in Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 所有股款必須以港元之支票或銀行本票支付。

sentences.english: But net profit still rose 12 per cent to HK$14.2bn.
sentences.chinese: 但公司淨利潤仍增長12%，至142億港元。

definition: Hong Kong Stock Exchange/abbr. for 香港交易所
sum of money raised (in a share subscription)
peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)
